name: Ignītus
description:
Ignītus is an atmospheric, top down, exploration, puzzle game. Which has a mysterious story and a unique aesthetics. The players find themselves set on a mission to bring back the fire that mysteriously perished. The color of the world is gone with the perished fire, just as the other tribesmen are. The only way to restore the balance and return colors to the world, is to combine the three sacred fires.

Can you find the way and be the saviour of the world?
